description:
Hi... Chances are... If you've seen more that one online tutorial in the last 8 yrs... then you already know the sound of my voice!

My name is Stephen Luc, I'm a member of the Empoweria team. I've been a Video Course Creation Pro for the last 8 Years.

You may even be one of the over 1000 students taking one of the two courses I have put on Udemy through Empoweria in the last two months!

...It's been a wonderful journey serving thousands of customers some here on Udemy and others from my own membership website! Over the years, I have also enjoyed watching my customers build $4-6 figures using private label rights videos I have made!

The popularity of my video courses have also given me the chance to work behind the scenes with many of the top marketers on some of the biggest launches online!

This popularity has brought me a lot of work creating videos, and it has forced me to develop my own formula for creating high quality video tutorials at record speed to keep up with demand!

This may sound crazy but since 2005, I have PERSONALLY CREATED OVER 2500 videos and over 140+ unique video training products!

Talk about a FRENZY OF VIDEO TUTORIAL PRODUCTION!

Most importantly to some, is the fact that my video courses have gone on to generate hundreds of thousands of dollars in sales for myself and the people who I have made them for!

I've searched and searched, so I feel pretty confident that I've got something special here that no other video developer in our industry has - because I've seen no one else come close to these numbers!

For instance, recently I created 75 video training course with each video running between 5-20 minutes in just 3 weeks! These videos alone earned over $100,000!

The demand for video tutorials has simply skyrocketed in the last few years!

Now you can take advantage of my 8 yrs of experience - as I divulge every trick, tip, and video creation secret that I have uncovered in making over 2,500 successful videos in the 17 video, video course!

In less than 2 hours you'll be making video tutorials like a PRO!

The 17 are broken up into 5 sections covering the "Video Philosophies" I have developed over the years - all the way to explaining the mechanics and tricks I use to render videos more quickly than you've ever thought possible!

If you have a passion for teaching, and yearn to create top notch tutorial videos, quickly and for profit, then this Udemy Video Course is for YOU!
title: Video Creation Fast Track
instructors: Promote Labs, Inc Team, Stephen Luc
